text: Futhi kungani ningasebenzisi endleleni kaMvelinqangi futhi ngelikaMvelinqangi ifa lamazulu nomhlaba abalingani phakathi kwenu laba abasebenzisa ngaphambili kokunqoba futhi balwa, labo bakhulu kakhulu ngezinga kunalabo abasebenzisa ngamumva futhi balwa, futhi uMvelinqangi uyakwazi lokho enikwenzayo
